name: Cosmograph Daytona, Oyster 40 mm, platinum
description: This Oyster Perpetual Cosmograph Daytona in platinum with an ice-blue dial and an Oyster bracelet, features a a chestnut brown Cerachrom bezel with tachymetric scale.

features: Measuring average speeds of up to 400 miles or kilometres per hour
Colour is unaffected by UV rays
Made in a single piece and holds the crystal firmly in place on the middle case, ensuring waterproofness

band.clasp: Folding Oysterlock safety clasp with Easylink 5 mm comfort extension link

case.architecture: Monobloc middle case, screw-down case back and winding crown

functions: Centre hour and minute hands, small seconds hand at 6 o'clock
Chronograph via centre seconds hand, 30-minute counter at 3 o'clock and 12-hour counter at 9 o'clock
Stop seconds for exact time setting
movement.oscillator: Paramagnetic blue Parachrom hairspring. High-performance Paraflex shock absorbers
